statements: SELECT * FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT data_controller, permission_granted FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, consent_date FROM consent_logs WHERE permission_granted = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM consent_logs WHERE consent_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, data_controller FROM consent_logs WHERE permission_granted = FALSE ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, data_controller, consent_date, permission_granted FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT id, data_controller FROM consent_logs WHERE consent_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01' ORDER BY consent_date DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS consent_count FROM consent_logs WHERE permission_granted = TRUE GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT data_controller, COUNT(*) AS consent_count FROM consent_logs GROUP BY data_controller ORDER BY consent_count DESC
SELECT id, user_id, data_controller, consent_date FROM consent_logs WHERE data_controller LIKE '%Company%' AND permission_granted = TRUE LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM consent_logs;
SELECT user_id, action FROM consent_logs WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE data_type = 'personal_data';
SELECT user_id, data_type, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM consent_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action FROM consent_logs WHERE action LIKE '%accepted%';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, data_category FROM consent_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT consent_id, data_category FROM consent_logs WHERE data_category = 'Health';
SELECT * FROM data_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '98765432-1010-1010-9876-555544440000';
SELECT * FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id='a12b34cd-5678-90ef-1234-5678abcd90ef';
SELECT user_id, data_category FROM consent_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT data_category FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type='read';
SELECT user_id, data_category FROM user_permissions WHERE data_category LIKE '%health%';
SELECT u.user_id, c.category_name FROM user_permissions u JOIN data_categories c ON u.data_category = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 5;
SELECT user_id, action FROM consent_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name FROM data_categories WHERE data_type = 'Sensitive';
SELECT activity_name, description FROM data_processing_activities WHERE activity_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM consent_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action FROM consent_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT data_type, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 3 AND permission_level > 2;
SELECT category_name FROM data_categories WHERE data_type = 'personal' ORDER BY category_id;
SELECT description FROM data_processing_activities WHERE activity_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM consent_logs;
SELECT user_id, consent_date FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM data_processing_activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_granted FROM user_permissions WHERE activity_id = 789 AND permission_granted = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM consent_logs ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM consent_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING log_count > 10;

SELECT users.username, data_categories.category_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id INNER JOIN data_categories ON user_permissions.activity_id = data_categories.category_id;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_name FROM data_processing_activities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%privacy%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS permission_count FROM user_permissions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY permission_count DESC;
